headline.main: Gladys Knight Starts Fundraising Effort for Community Center
headline.print_headline: Gladys Knight Starts Fundraising Effort for Community Center

lead_paragraph: Gladys Knight says being married to a western North Carolina native has turned her into a country girl at heart, and she's hoping to turn that new affection into possibly the best thing that's ever happened to Canton.
snippet: Gladys Knight says being married to a western North Carolina native has turned her into a country girl at heart, and she's hoping to turn that new affection into possibly the best thing that's ever happened to Canton....
